question: My mother suffered from a stroke close to 15 years ago.  She has diabetes as well as high blood pressure.  After the stroke she began to have severe burning and tingling sensation to her left foot.  There was nothing the doctors could do about it except prescribe pain medication which did not help.  Acupuncture did not help also.  We found this cooling gel that did relieve some of the pain which made it more bearable.  If you know of anyone with the same symptoms and would like the gel, please contact me.  ***@****
title: burning or tingling feet sensation
